entries.meaning: A short report, especially one released through official channels to be immediately broadcast or publicized.
A time-sensitive news item or short news report.
examples: Synonyms: alert, breaking news, newsflash, update

entries.meaning: A short printed publication, especially one produced regularly by an organization.

verbs.description: bulletin (third-person singular simple present bulletins, present participle bulletining, simple past and past participle bulletined)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To announce (something) by means of such a report or publication.
